body_html:
@zuoxingdong , What OS are you using ? I'm using RH 7.5 Cuda 9.2 (cuda-9-2-9.2.88-1.ppc64le). My build is fine using the commit I mentioned. But with #8708 the build fails when building nccl which is different problem from yours. Some of the builds I do with cuda 9.0 succeeds fine (see https://powerci.osuosl.org/job/pytorch-linux-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-mpi-build-test-gpu/). I also have some offline 9.1 builds that are OK . It must have something to do with cuda 9.2.
@soumith Are you guys building with cuda 9.2 in your jenkins environment ?

body:
@zuoxingdong , What OS  are you using ?   I'm using RH 7.5  Cuda 9.2 (cuda-9-2-9.2.88-1.ppc64le).   My build is fine using the commit I mentioned. But with #8708 the build fails when building nccl which is different problem from yours.   Some of the builds I do with cuda 9.0  succeeds fine (see https://powerci.osuosl.org/job/pytorch-linux-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-mpi-build-test-gpu/).  I also have some offline 9.1 builds that are OK .  It must have something to do with cuda 9.2.    
@soumith Are you guys building with cuda 9.2 in your jenkins environment ?
